description: Chipotles add heat and smokiness to this dish, which can be served as a salad or used to fill corn tortillas for soft tacos The radishes give a fresh crunch and the avocado gives a cool creaminess
title: Southwestern Chicken Salad With Chipotle Chiles
title_page: Southwestern Chicken Salad With Chipotle Chiles Recipe - NYT Cooking
